force.description: Force a given operation (where supported by imgadm(1M)).

uuid.description: Image UUID. Can either be a full UUID or C(*) for all images.

state.description: State the object operated on should be in. C(imported) is an alias for for C(present) and C(deleted) for C(absent). When set to C(vacuumed) and C(uuid) to C(*), it will remove all unused images.

pool.description: zpool to import to or delete images from.
